    • startCardProduction

      public boolean startCardProduction​(int slot) throws NotEnoughResourcesException
      Save the resources necessary to activate the top card of the selected slot only if those resources are present in the stores, and if the same card wasn't already activated.
      Returns:
      true if the production of the selected card was activated, false if the same card has been activated before
      Throws:
      NotEnoughResourcesException - when there aren't enough resources in the store to activate the production of the selected card
